official_title: A bill to amend the Credit Repair Organizations Act to establish a new disclosure statement.

summary.text: Amends the Credit Repair Organizations Act to require the disclosure statement a credit repair organization must provide to any consumer before any contract or agreement is executed to notify the consumer of his or her right to obtain a free copy of his or her credit report once every 12 months from each of the nationwide consumer reporting agencies.
